ygData.subject: RE: Also...
ygData.msgSnippet: Honorable brother, Yes, as you suggest, there are two types of sewing kits. One is a small sewing kit. The other is a large sewing kit; it contains space for
ygData.messageBody:
Honorable brother,

Yes, as you suggest, there are two types of sewing kits. One is a small sewing
kit. The other is a large sewing kit; it contains space for the combination of
up to eight total items. I believe, if you are in the vicinity of Northern Ro
after exiting East Freeport, you can find such a kit by visiting the merchant
tailor in the leftmost room of the Inn located in the grassy area there. May
Quellious guide you.

Manjushri
Bearer of the yellow sash of the Ashen Order
(Fennin Ro)

At 11:12 AM 9/17/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Garza, Russell" <r.garza@...>
>
>So, you are saying that you need 2 silks to make a swatch...
>and you need two swatches, and a pattern to make the tunic and leggings...
>
>Well, my sewing kit has only 2 slots. How can I combine 2 swatches and a
>pattern if I only have 2 slots in my kit?
>
>Do you need a different kit to make this armor?
>
